title: Alice Smart System — Γ-Net: A Physics-Driven Electronic Lifeform
description: A complete implementation of the Γ-Net (Gamma-Net) architecture: a physics-driven electronic lifeform that models cognition, emotion, pain, sleep, language emergence, and psychopathology through impedance-mismatch equations derived from coaxial transmission line theory. Includes 146 source files (84,500+ lines), 1,876 passing tests, 46 experiments, and a 5-paper research monograph series.
notes: Paper series: (I) Minimum Reflection Principle, (II) Body-Brain Integration, (III) Emergent Psychopathology, (IV) Consciousness and Ethics, (V) Fontanelle Thermodynamics. All papers, source code, tests, and experimental scripts are included.
